lessons.japanese: 何でこんなに早く来たの？
lessons.english: What did you come here so early for?

lessons.japanese: 君はこんなによい友人を持って幸運だ。
lessons.english: You are fortunate for having such good friends.

lessons.japanese: 君がこんなに早くくるとは思わなかったよ。
lessons.english: I didn't expect you to get here so soon.

lessons.japanese: なぜこんなに早く来たの？
lessons.english: What has brought you here so early?

lessons.japanese: なぜあなたは、こんなに早く起きたのですか。
lessons.english: Why did you get up so early?
